tasks.title: Implement Weighted Edits Support
tasks.rationale: To enhance similarity scoring by allowing certain character substitutions to have different weights.
deliverables: New API method distance_with_weights(s1, s2, weights_map)

tasks.title: Add Max-Distance Cutoff Option
tasks.rationale: To improve performance by allowing early termination of distance calculations for large input sets.
deliverables: Methods distance(s1, s2, max_dist=N) and similarity(s1, s2, max_dist=N)

tasks.title: Implement Multi-Threaded Batch Computation
tasks.rationale: To allow faster processing of large lists of strings for similarity ranking.
deliverables: New batch method batch_distance(list1, list2, threads=T)

tasks.title: Output Edit Operations Path
tasks.rationale: To provide detailed insights into the edit operations performed during distance calculations.
deliverables: Method distance_with_ops(s1, s2) returning detailed operations

tasks.title: Support Unicode Grapheme Clusters
tasks.rationale: To ensure multi-codepoint characters are treated as single units in distance calculations.
deliverables: Tests covering grapheme vs code-point scenarios

tasks.title: Introduce Pure-Python Fallback Module
tasks.rationale: To maintain functionality on platforms where the C extension cannot compile.
